website_summaries.verdict: Overall, the Asics Gel Pulse 11 definitely impressed the majority of the consumers. With its features and technologies, the shoe received positive comments about its comfort level, cushioning, and design. Aside from its design, the snug fit was also agreeable for most of the users. Although some have found toe box issues, a good number of them still lauded the visually-appealing style and excellent performance of the Asics Gel Pulse 11 on the roads.
pros: Several buyers say that the Asics Gel Pulse 11 is comfortable
Some of the testers commented that the shoe is best for general recreational wear and long-distance running activities
Various users love the snug fit of the Gel Pulse 11
According to those who have tried it, the shoe is stylish
The majority of the wearers love the feel of the Gel cushioning while running
The shoe is well-cushioned, based on some reviews
cons: A few numbers of users commented that the footwear has a narrow toe box

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely brilliant
customer_reviews.text: I bought these with a little bit of trepidation - trainers, half a size up, not tried on and off the internet! I needn't have worried - I'm usually an 8 but went for an 8.5 and they were absolutely perfect. I wore them that night for a run - no wearing in required. They are super comfortable, cushioned and supportive and despite running upwards of 15-20km a week (I'm a new runner) for the last 3 weeks, they've been brilliant. Would have no hesitation in recommending them and the half size up was perfect for my wider-than-average feet.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. V. Blake

customer_reviews.title: Very happy - suprised at how comfortable they are!
customer_reviews.text: Could not have been happier. Was reluctant to buy online and not try first but due to lockdown had not other option. The shoes are SO comfortable. I got a 1/2 size up from 6 to 6.5. They support my ankles and it feels like I have suspension when I run.
customer_reviews.author: Jasper

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great trainers, comfortable and fit like a glove. Wouldn't normally buy trainers online but it was during Lockdown so didn't have a choice. Would thoroughly recommend. My first pair of running trainers so I don't have any others to compare them to.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Good value for money! I wear mine for my 5- 10 km runs three times a week and there are just perfect. To begin with I felt like there a quite thight, but that gives extra support and I now appreciate it. The colour is a very bright pink, which is not clear in the pictures. I love it, but it does feel like everybody is looking. Maybe not everybodys cup of tea.
customer_reviews.author: Janina Westphal

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Light and comfortable shoes. I always wear Asics so knew to order bigger size I am a 6 but ordered 7.great fit
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Order Bigger!
customer_reviews.text: Delivery came in the estimated 3 days and quality of product was good. Unfortunately they were too small, my toes stuck out the top... I am usually a size 7 so ordered a 7 but as they're a 40.5 they were too small. Plus trainers need to be a bit roomier so now going to get the 7.5s (41.5) and hope they're better.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: No grip. Slippery when wet
customer_reviews.text: As a keen runner I have always used ASICS trainers and found them to fit my awkward wide feet perfectly. I’m disappointed though for the first time with this pair because they are slippery when its damp or wet outside. I am cautious when running because I am scared to fall which is having a knock on effect to my running style and will probably end up creating an injury. I now need to buy a different pair when I only just brought these.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky

customer_reviews.title: Screwed up my order
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two pairs of these trainers; one in a U.K. size 6.5 and the other in a U.K. 7. That way I’d know at lease one would fit me. Amazon have sent me a U.K. size 5.5 and U.K. size 6 instead. Totally useless to me as both way too small! So I guess my plan wasn’t entirely fool proof! Those fools managed to still screw it up despite my best efforts. Yes I’ll be asking for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Parkinson

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Love them I run a lot at the gym and outdoors comfortable and fit is perfect plus for the price they are great but I only buy Acsis great training pumps
customer_reviews.author: Susanna

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Great running shoes. True to size, comfortable and lightweight yet great foot support. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Z.

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: Comfy with good support bit loose around the ankle area however overall really good. Very light wieght and very brightly coloured
customer_reviews.author: Henry lavery

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as expected. Great fit, very comfortable. Fantastic colour, I can be seen for miles away which helps with social distancing (week 2 of Corona Virus social distancing).
customer_reviews.author: V Durrant

customer_reviews.title: Watch the sizing!
customer_reviews.text: Bought same size as other gel pulse trainers, but these seem a lot bigger, could have done with 1/2 size down, but otherwise really comfortable trainers
customer_reviews.author: Logi21

customer_reviews.title: Great runners
customer_reviews.text: I bought the same size as my gel pulse 7 and it was perfect. Really comfortable runners. I’m delighted with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: True to size and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable, arrived on time. Lots of support. I'm not a natural runner but these help cushion the impact making it much more enjoyable going running!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Booth

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughters birthday she wore them twice and a whole appeared in the toe area I’m not happy
customer_reviews.author: Karen Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Support and flexibility
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, super comfortable. Give me support and flexibility at the same time. I use them for HIIT classes and other similar workouts.
customer_reviews.author: sabrisa

customer_reviews.title: There light to wear and look good
customer_reviews.text: There light to wear comfortable no rubbing onheels therefore no need to were them in Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: sharon cutts

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I've had these trainers for 8 months and I run 2/3 x a week. The trainers all ready have a hole in the front. Really poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Good trainers for runners.
customer_reviews.text: They’re a little snug for a size 5. Should have returned them but wearing them for my jogging has stopped the pain in my heal!
customer_reviews.author: Surjit Chana

customer_reviews.title: Good values running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy straight away and much more supportive than my older cheaper running shoes
customer_reviews.author: RandomCamel

customer_reviews.title: Great for running
customer_reviews.text: Brought them for my daughter who loves running. They are great for running!
customer_reviews.author: Rose Clancy

product_meta.title: ASICS Men's Gel-Pulse 11 Running Shoe
product_meta.description: Established record times on your favorite routes wearing the comfortable Gel-Pulse 11. Each support is softer on the feet with these running shoes, thanks to the cushioning system of the forefoot and back foot. In addition, your foot will rotate smoothly in the deadlift with a super speva midsole with a large rebound, for faster and more effective thrusts. Enjoy the superb comfort offered by the elastic midsole and the gel cushioning. Run without wasting Effort thanks to the flexible grooves that help guide your foot. Simple and uniform stride thanks to the more elastic super speva midsole.
feature_bullets: Overlay reinforcements - Swathe the midfoot and forefoot to promote lockdown.
Double mesh heel - Secures the rearfoot.
EVA sockliner - Moulds to the shape of your foot.
SpevaFoam 45 Lasting - For a soft feel and improved comfort.
